title: Universal design application workshop for enhancing online learning inclusivity

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and experience in online learning
context.additional_context: While digital devices are provided, a personalized approach is necessary to accommodate diverse learning abilities and age groups.

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three universal design principles that accommodate diverse learner needs in online platforms
Learners can develop content production plans using technical accessibility tools such as text-to-speech conversion and color contrast adjustments
Learners can submit inclusive online learning activity design prototypes through iterative feedback-based design processes
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
